thread.title: Lisa Welch

author: Lisa Welch
title: Lisa Welch
text: I love using Topcashback.com. I use it for all of my online purchases and most sites provide a cash back percentage on your purchases. I let my cash back accrue and then pull the money out for Christmas or for extra spending money on vacations. I have tried other cash back sites but Topcashback is the best. They have more businesses on their site and their site is so easy to use! I recommend it to everyone!
